class.name: ueye_cam/UEyeStereoCamNodelet
class.description: UEye Camera stereo image acquisition nodelet. Reads images from a UEye camera and publishes the raw images with corresponding calibration data.

class.name: ueye_cam/ROSBagLogNodelet
class.description: Logging nodelet, avoids expensive data copying/serialization by receiving shared pointers via publications, rather than regular network-driven communication.
